name: Lion's Mane
description: The Lion's Mane (Hericium erinaceus), also known as Bearded Tooth Mushroom or Pom-Pom, is a spectacular edible and medicinal mushroom with long, hanging white spines. It grows on hardwood and is considered endangered (RL2 Germany). Particularly remarkable are its neuroregenerative properties through erinacines, which stimulate nerve growth - promising for Alzheimer's and neurological diseases.
